name: @scramjet/api-client-py
description: This package is part of Scramjet Transform Hub. The package provides the Python API Client for use with Scramjet Transform Hub.

scripts.build:only: mkdir -p dist/__pydeps__/ && cp *.py dist/ && pip3 install -t dist/__pydeps__/ -r requirements.txt

author: Scramjet <opensource@scramjet.org>
